values: 步；步伐；步骤；措施；手段；脚步；脚步声；一步的距离；梯级；台阶；阶梯；音级；音阶；程序；级别；等级；踏板操
踩；踏；踏步；迈步；行走；移动；采取措施；执行；进行

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 跳舞者；花很多时间参加社交活动的学生；以特殊姿态行走的人或动物；分档器

word_mean_info__list.difference: 指身体向前移动的速度和情况。表一步距离时，可与step换用。
普通用词，指脚抬起落下的动作和一步的距离。抽象概念指步骤。

word_group.brief_definition: 暂时离开；暂时走开；与…外出娱乐；与…外出参加社交活动；大步走；健步走
先采取行动；迈出第一步
加快, 增加, 加强；挺身而出；采取行动
一步一步, 逐步地
采取措施
更进一步
退一步以便更客观地思考
重要步骤；重要的一步；重要举措
迈出一步；走一步；踏出一步
后退一步
当心
提供帮助
步入
与他人一起走齐步, 一致, 协调, 同步
争执不一, 不合节拍, 步伐错乱
(尤用以要求加速驾驶)开快点儿, 赶快
开始行动, 采取措施(以抓住机会或应对危机)
临时顶替某人工作, 临时顶缺
停止齐步走
插手帮助；顶替；代替

bilingual.source: It was time to take the first step.
We are also excited about taking a new step.
bilingual.target: 我们也对迈出新的一步感到兴奋。

bilingual.source: We can help you develop new skills step by step.
bilingual.target: 我们可以一步步帮助你发展新技能。

bilingual.source: The Teacher's Book offers practical step-by-step instructions.
bilingual.target: 教师用书提供了实用的逐步指导。

bilingual.source: The first step is to find someone you trust to talk to.
bilingual.target: 第一步是找到你信任的人谈谈。

bilingual.source: Now scientists are one step closer to discovering all the species on Earth.
bilingual.target: 现在科学家们离发现地球上的所有物种又近了一步。

bilingual.source: This signalled one step further in China's plan to establish a space station in the future.
bilingual.target: 这标志着中国在未来建立空间站的计划又迈进了一步。
她一步一步建造自己的事业。

bilingual.source: We are approaching our goal step by step.
bilingual.target: 我们一步一步地接近目标。

bilingual.source: You can solve this problem step by step.
bilingual.target: 你可以一步一步地解决这个问题。

list.abstract: STEP，英文单词，名词、及物动词、不及物动词，作名词时意为“步，脚步；步骤；步伐；梯级”，作及物动词时意为“走，迈步”，作不及物动词时意为“踏，踩；走”。
STEP（Standard for the Exchange of Product Model Data）即产品模型数据交互规范，是国际标准化组织制定的描述整个产品生命周期内产品信息的标准。 它提供了一种不依赖具体系统的中性机制，不仅适合于交换文件，也适合于作为执行和分享产品数据库和存档的基础，发达国家已经将其推向了工业应用。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh. That's a big step. It is?
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是很大的一步啊。是吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Step two: Plant feet firmly on ground. Right.
yingyinNormal.zh: 第二步，稳稳的站在地上。好的。

yingyinNormal.en: No, I'm lost, too. I think she skipped a step.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不，我也糊涂了，我觉得她跳过了一步。

yingyinNormal.en: Take him. They come one step closer, shoot me. Stop.
yingyinNormal.zh: 抓住他。他们再靠近一步，就朝我开枪。停下。

yingyinNormal.en: Step one: die. It's a cold, hard fact of fossilization.
yingyinNormal.zh: 第一步：死亡。成为化石的过程是冰冷无情的。

yingyinNormal.en: Step three: Remove string from bag, releasing the winds. Check.
yingyinNormal.zh: 第三步，把绳子解开，把风放出来。好的。

yingyinNormal.en: Step 1: prepare! prepare !prepare!
yingyinNormal.zh: 步骤一：准备！准备！准备！
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《公开场合演讲如何展现自信？》

yingyinNormal.en: Step two, enter our apartment. Step three, enter my bedroom. Step four.
yingyinNormal.zh: 第二步，走进我们的房子，第三步...走进我的房间，第四步...

yingyinNormal.en: Now, if you'll just take us step-by-step through exactly what happened.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你一步一步说清楚这里到底发生了什么。

yingyinNormal.en: Step four is to design a plan to eliminate the problems. This is where you will determine what you need to do to get around them. And step five is to execute those designs, pushing yourself to do what's needed to progress toward your goal.
yingyinNormal.zh: 第四步设计消灭问题的计划。这一步你要决定如何处理问题。第五步实施这些计划，鞭策自己完成要做的向你的目标进发。

yingyinNormal.en: Hello? Okay, step four. Do you see that small plastic case on my dresser?
yingyinNormal.zh: 喂？第四步，你看到我化妆台上的塑料小盒吗？

yingyinNormal.en: What do you do when it does? Don't give up. Take it one step at a time and... Just do the next right thing? Yeah. You got it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那时你该怎么做呢？别放弃。一步一步慢慢来，并且... 继续做正确的事。对，你很懂。

yingyinNormal.en: Let's see, it says here. Step one: Point bag away from home. Okay.
yingyinNormal.zh: 看看，这里说，第一步，把袋子指向家的反方向。好的。

yingyinNormal.en: It's okay. I don't trust him. Which is the first step to truly knowing me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 没事的。我不信任他。那是真正了解我的第一步。

yingyinNormal.en: Doing this well is just a matter of following a simple five-step process.
yingyinNormal.zh: 要能良好地做到这一点，只需要遵循简单的五步走。

yingyinNormal.en: Urged me to walk the kingdom with him, gout wouldn't let me take a step.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他让我陪他在汗国走一走，但痛风让我无法踏出一步。

yingyinNormal.en: We've been moving so quickly. Maybe we should take a step back. Think this through again.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们最近太急了，或许该退后一步，好好考虑一下。

yingyinNormal.en: I can't, not without destroying you. Your memories are the first step to consciousness.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我做不到，除非把你毁了，记忆是你建立意识的第一步。

yingyinNormal.en: The final step in our evaluation is always to see what happens when the monitor's removed.
yingyinNormal.zh: 评估的最后一步，都是要看看监控器取走后你们的反应。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay. Enough chitchat. Okay, step one. Locate your emergency key to our apartment.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好了，闲聊得够了，听好，第一步，找到我们房子的备用钥匙。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 步骤; 措施; 阶段

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: n. 跨步；步子；梯级；台阶；措施；手段；音级；全音；半音；跑步有氧健身法

sense_info_list.en: an action in a series of actions taken for a particular purpose
sense_info_list.zh: 步骤; 措施; 阶段

examination_example.sentence: The first <highlight>step</highlight>, as Erik Brynjolfsson and Andrew McAfee argue in The Second Machine Age, should be rethinking education and job training.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 正如Erik Brynjolfsson和Andrew McAfee在《第二次机械革命》一书中所言，第一步应该是重新思考教育和职业培训。

examination_example.sentence: The court's ruling is a <highlight>step</highlight> forward in the struggle against both corruption and official favoritism.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最高法院的裁决是在与腐败、“公务偏袒”这两者的斗争中所取得的一个进步。

examination_example.sentence: Relying on ethical persuasion rather than law to address the misuse of body ideals may be the best <highlight>step</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 依靠道德劝说而非法律来处理理想体形的滥用问题，可能是佳措施。

sense_info_list.en: the sound of a footstep; the act of lifting one foot and putting it down on a different part of the ground, such as when you walk or run

examination_example.sentence: You'd think this might fuel the efficiency mind-set, but in fact, Eberle notes, such ritualistic behaviour helps us "<highlight>step</highlight> outside time's flow" into "soul time."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你可能会认为这会助长效率思维定势，但事实上，埃伯勒指出，这种仪式行为帮助我们“走出时间的流动”进入“灵魂时间”

examination_example.sentence: I've seen image upgrades be particularly helpful during transitions — when looking for a new job, <highlight>stepping</highlight> into a new or more public role.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我发现，在过渡时期——找新工作、步入新的或更公众的角色时，提升形象特别有帮助。

sense_info_list.en: a particular position or grade on an ascending or hierarchical scale
the interval between two notes that are next to each other in a scale

word_usage.usage: 熟词僻义：step除了“脚步；台阶”之外，还有“步骤，措施”的意思，take steps to do sth. 表示“采取措施做某事”。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: “举步、踏步”，指一步一步地踏过。
“步行、散步”，指花费一定时间以较慢的速度徒步行进。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 跨过; 踏; 踮起脚走

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: n. 跨步；步子；梯级；台阶；措施；手段；音级；全音；半音；跑步有氧健身法

sense_info_list.en: an action in a series of actions taken for a particular purpose

examination_example.sentence: But there's no denying ethical leadership is at least a critical <highlight>step</highlight> in the right direction.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但不可否认，有道德的领导至少是朝着正确方向迈出的关键一步。

examination_example.sentence: As countries continue setting goals of reducing emissions, greater <highlight>steps</highlight> need to be taken to have a noticeable effect on the surrounding environment.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 随着各国继续设定减排目标，需要采取更多的措施才能对周围环境产生显著影响。

examination_example.sentence: One of the first <highlight>steps</highlight> in dealing with emotions such as anger or fear is to acknowledge them as normal and human.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 处理愤怒或恐惧等情绪的第一步是承认它们是正常的、有人情味的。

examination_example.sentence: What set him apart was a self-confident vision of the <highlight>steps</highlight> that needed to be taken to consolidate his own position in that field.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 使他与众不同的是，他对巩固自己在这一领域的地位所需要采取的步骤充满自信。

sense_info_list.zh: 跨过; 踏; 踮起脚走

sense_info_list.en: the act of lifting one foot and putting it down on a different part of the ground, such as when you walk or run

word_usage.usage:
step作名词，表“步骤, 措施”时，为可数名词。“采取措施做某事”用take steps to do sth.表达，不跟动名词形式。
示例：我们必须采取措施减少空气污染。
误 We must take steps reducing pollution of the air.
正 We must take steps to reduce pollution of the air.

step表“脚步”时，为可数名词，其前加数词时可表示“…步的距离”。
示例：I followed her, five steps behind.
我跟着她，保持 5 步的距离。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 以步测量; 一步的距离
跳舞; 轻快地走; 舞步; 步伐

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: n. 跨步；步子；梯级；台阶；措施；手段；音级；全音；半音；跑步有氧健身法

examination_example.sentence: My advice is that you not pay attention to the number of <highlight>steps</highlight> and ingredients, because they can be deceiving.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我的建议是，你不要在意有多少步骤和成分，因为它们可能具有欺骗性。

examination_example.sentence: The most difficult <highlight>step</highlight> in programming values will be deciding exactly what we believe is moral.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对价值观进行编程最困难的一步将是精准地认定我们的道德观。

examination_example.sentence: There are some cautious <highlight>steps</highlight> I can take, but ultimately I can not guarantee myself that.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我可以采取一些谨慎的措施，但我不能保证结果。

sense_info_list.en: the act of lifting one foot and putting it down on a different part of the ground; such as when you walk or run

examination_example.sentence: Ms. Li took a <highlight>step</highlight> back and used her experience to build Sanity & Self, a self-care app and platform for overworked women.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 李女士退一步，用自己的经验建立了一个为过度劳累的女性提供自我护理的应用程序和平台Sanity & Self。

sense_info_list.en: an action in a series of actions taken for a particular purpose

examination_example.sentence: So take the <highlight>step</highlight> of joining an organization to build face-to-face relationships.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 因此，采取加入组织的步骤来建立面对面的关系。

examination_example.sentence: Today's announcement between ScottishPower and Glasgow City Council—to make Glasgow the UK's first net-zero city—is a very welcome <highlight>step</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 苏格兰电力公司和格拉斯哥市议会今天宣布，格拉斯哥将成为英国第一个净零城市，这个举措极受欢迎。

examination_example.sentence: A British study took these findings one <highlight>step</highlight> further, asking subjects to complete a creative.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 英国的一项研究更进一步，要求受试者完成一项创造性的研究。

sense_info_list.zh: 以步测量; 一步的距离

examination_example.sentence: Letting them simply play--or playing with them--could seem like a <highlight>step</highlight> backward.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 让他们简单地玩，或者和他们一起玩，似乎是一种倒退。

examination_example.sentence: Public health groups applauded the approved tax as a <highlight>step</highlight> toward fixing certain lasting health issues that plague Americans.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 公共卫生组织对批准的这项征税法案表示赞赏，认为这是解决长期困扰美国人的某些健康问题迈出的一步。

examination_example.sentence: So take a <highlight>step</highlight> back, switch off the automatic pilot and actually stop and reflect about things like our priorities, our values, and our relationships.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 所以退一步说，关掉自动驾驶，停下来反思一下我们的优先事项，我们的价值观和我们的关系。

sense_info_list.zh: 跳舞; 轻快地走; 舞步; 步伐

word_usage.usage:
step表“脚步”时，为可数名词，其前加数词时可表示“…步的距离”。
示例：I followed her, five steps behind.
我跟着她，保持 5 步的距离。

step作名词，表“步骤, 措施”时，为可数名词。“采取措施做某事”用take steps to do sth.表达，不跟动名词形式。
示例：我们必须采取措施减少空气污染。
误 We must take steps reducing pollution of the air.
正 We must take steps to reduce pollution of the air.

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 暂时离开；暂时走开；与…外出娱乐；与…外出参加社交活动；大步走；健步走

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: n. 跨步；步子；梯级；台阶；措施；手段；音级；全音；半音；跑步有氧健身法

examination_example.sentence: What comes next is the endless series of <highlight>steps</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 接下来是无休止的一系列步骤。

examination_example.sentence: If the <highlight>steps</highlight> you take are working, keep it up.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你采取的措施奏效了，那就坚持下去。

examination_example.sentence: If you're willing to build trust in a relationship again, we have some <highlight>steps</highlight> you can take to get you there.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你愿意在一段关系中再次建立信任，我们有一些步骤可以让你达到目的。

examination_example.sentence: Some other companies are taking their digital beings a <highlight>step</highlight> further, enabling organizations to create digital humans themselves using free-access platforms they provide.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 其他一些公司正在进一步发展他们的数字人，使组织能够使用他们提供的免费访问平台创建自己的数字人。

examination_example.sentence: The first <highlight>step</highlight> is to go exploring, if you're out of your comfort zone.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你不在舒适区，第一步就是去探索。

examination_example.sentence: At home, my dad said, "A job's a big <highlight>step</highlight> to growing up. I'm glad you will be contributing to the household."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在家里，父亲说：“工作是成长的一大步。我很高兴你能为家庭做出贡献。”

examination_example.sentence: Parents might take this chance to <highlight>step</highlight> in and make their own summer reading list and plan a family trip to the library.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 家长们可能会借此机会参与进来，制作自己的暑期阅读清单，并计划一次家庭图书馆之旅。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Stepping</highlight> out not only helped a brother in need, it also gave my kids the sweet taste of helping others.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 走出家门不仅帮助了一个需要帮助的兄弟，也让我的孩子们尝到了帮助他人的甜头。

examination_example.sentence: I guess that there's probably some demanding work schedule, or social anxiety around <highlight>stepping</highlight> up to help for an unknown sport.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我猜可能有一些苛刻的工作日程，或者社交焦虑围绕着帮助一项未知的运动。

examination_example.sentence: Color choices in this range are a <highlight>step</highlight> up from the small ones in two major ways.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这一系列的颜色选择在两个主要方面比小的颜色选择有所提高。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 步骤; 措施; 阶段
脚步声; 迈步; 行走

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 暂时离开；暂时走开；与…外出娱乐；与…外出参加社交活动；大步走；健步走
先采取行动；迈出第一步
加快；增加；加强；挺身而出；采取行动
重要步骤；重要的一步；重要举措
退一步以便更客观地思考
迈出一步；走一步；踏出一步

sense_info_list.en: an action in a series of actions taken for a particular purpose
sense_info_list.zh: 步骤; 措施; 阶段

examination_example.sentence: We'd better follow the seven-<highlight>step</highlight> hand-washing method to keep healthy.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们最好遵循七步洗手法来保持健康。

examination_example.sentence: However, everyone can avoid it by taking a few simple <highlight>steps</highlight> today!
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是，今天大家可以通过几个简单的步骤来避免它！

examination_example.sentence: But those failures put him one <highlight>step</highlight> closer to success.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但这些失败让他离成功又近了一步。

sense_info_list.en: the sound of a footstep; the act of lifting one foot and putting it down, such as when you walk or run
sense_info_list.zh: 脚步声; 迈步; 行走

examination_example.sentence: Giraffe's long legs mean they take big <highlight>steps</highlight> when they walk or run.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 长颈鹿的长腿意味着它们在走路或跑步时会迈出大步。

examination_example.sentence: Zebra <highlight>stepped</highlight> back and was leaving.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 斑马后退一步，准备离开。

examination_example.sentence: The man <highlight>stepping</highlight> forward first would be praised.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 先上前的人会受到表扬。

word_usage.usage:
step作名词，表“步骤, 措施”时，为可数名词。“采取措施做某事”用take steps to do sth.表达，不跟动名词形式。
示例：我们必须采取措施减少空气污染。
误 We must take steps reducing pollution of the air.
正 We must take steps to reduce pollution of the air.

step表“脚步”时，为可数名词，其前加数词时可表示“…步的距离”。
示例：I followed her, five steps behind.
我跟着她，保持 5 步的距离。
